channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Aspose.PDF for C++
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Aspose.PDF for C++

item.title: CVE-2019-5042|2024-08-04T19:47:55.846Z -- talos -- aspose.pdf%20for%20c%2B%2B
item.description: An exploitable Use-After-Free vulnerability exists in the way FunctionType 0 PDF elements are processed in Aspose.PDF 19.2 for C++. A specially crafted PDF can cause a dangling heap pointer, resulting in a use-after-free. An attacker can send a malicious PDF to trigger this vulnerability.
